mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ReviewThx (regionCategory, reviewTitle, reviewContext, donator, receiver, reviewDate, reviewImage) VALUES (#{regionCategory}, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContext}, #{donator}, #{receiver}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT regionCategory, reviewTitle, reviewContext, donator, receiver, reviewDate, reviewImage FROM ReviewThx
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ReviewThx WHERE reviewTitle = #{reviewTitle} + donator = #{donator}
